key_papers: Advanced Bionics 'Legacy Implants' page (CII introduced 2001).
notes: Chip generation enabling later HiRes processing upgrades.

key_papers: Advanced Bionics 'Legacy Implants' page (HiRes 90K launched 2003).
notes: First AB implant with removable magnet for MRI (per AB page).

key_papers: Advanced Bionics 'Legacy Implants' page (HiRes 90K Advantage introduced 2013).
notes: Mechanical improvements over HiRes 90K.

key_papers: Advanced Bionics 'Legacy Implants' page (HiRes Ultra introduced 2016).
notes: Thin-profile internal implant generation; note 2020 FDA recall/field action relates to Ultra/Ultra 3D families.

key_papers: Advanced Bionics 'About AB' timeline (Ultra 3D 2018); FDA safety notice on Ultra/Ultra 3D (2020).
notes: MRI-oriented design; affected by 2020 voluntary field corrective action / reliability updates.

key_papers: MED-EL blog on MRI history (COMBI 40+ introduced 1996); Eshraghi 2012 historical review (CI history context).
notes: Included for lineage completeness; common reference point for MED-EL MRI approvals.

key_papers: AudiologyOnline release on PULSARCI100 (Jun 1, 2005); FDA PMA P000025 supplement family (model list pdf includes Mi1200/Mi1000 etc).
notes: Treat as a distinct internal platform generation (post-COMBI, pre-SONATA).

key_papers: Hainarosie 2014 review (next-gen launched 2006 incl. MED-EL); FDA PMA P000025 supplement page includes SONATA in manufacturing supplement list.
trial_ids: FDA PMA: P000025/S102 (mentions SONATA in scope)
notes: Often referenced as titanium implant generation prior to CONCERT/CONCERTO.

key_papers: MED-EL timeline (MAESTRO system: CONCERTO implant, 2010); FDA PMA document lists Mi1000 MED‑EL CONCERT/CONCERTO references.
trial_ids: FDA PMA: P000025 (e.g., S102; model list pdf)
notes: Internal implant associated with MAESTRO system generation.

key_papers: MED-EL SYNCHRONY page (system overview); announcement of FDA approval (Jan 23, 2015).
notes: Notable for MRI safety claims (incl. 3T under conditions).

key_papers: FDA PMA supplement record (P000025/S110) for Mi1250 SYNCHRONY 2 (PIN).
notes: Design change to central lead exit per FDA supplement; treat as a separate generation per your rules.

key_papers: Oticon Medical reliability report (states Neuro system available since Nov 2015).
notes: Predecessor/umbrella system that later includes Neuro Zti variants.

key_papers: Oticon Medical corporate news (FDA PMA for Neuro system, Jun 24, 2021); FDA Neuro Zti IFU PDF (P200021D).
notes: US introduction 2021; internally the implant range is branded Neuro Zti.

key_papers: Digisonic SP user brochure (describes as 3rd generation); Eshraghi 2012 historical review (Digisonic lineage).
notes: Often referenced in European literature; treat as a distinct implant generation.
